Feel free to edit this article... heavily. And add, please.

Two questions- 1. how do you add a picture? I wanted to put "Westward" in. 2. how do you add a footnote thing? I need to credit Wikipedia for some of the stuff on Manifest Destiny.

Do we want to have a free-flowing page or break it up? I'm thinking Plot Summary / Major themese / Quotes. The problem with that is that, since this is DFW, everything seems to connect to everything else.emrad 07:57, 18 April 2009 (PDT)


I looked up how to add a picture and it looks like uploading files has been disabled for this wiki. Unless that gets turned on, we'll have to remain pictureless. Sherlockelly 12:24, 20 April 2009 (PDT)

Whoops. Thanks for the note; I'll turn it on. KF 14:39, 20 April 2009 (PDT)

Image uploading is now available... KF 10:16, 21 April 2009 (PDT)


Emily (I assume you're the one who put in most of the work so far here), do you think you could organize your writing under the new headings? I feel like as the writer you're the best judge of where it should all go; as you mention, some things blend various headings, and there is probably no right answer, but I think your answer is more valid than someone who didn't write it. Meg 16:25, 20 April 2009 (PDT)

Yes, I will organize it, but I think I'd like to wait to see what other people put up so I can work within that. emrad 19:23, 22 April 2009 (PDT)

Em, just so you know when to organize, I'm basically done with adding to Plot, will still edit. I'll write characters and themes tonight. Cgf02007 18:04, 7 May 2009 (PDT)
